Description: Waterside at Reston Apartments for rent in Reston, VA offers you a location that truly allows you to enjoy the Capital area, plus a community with a ton of relaxing amenities. In addition to all of these benefits, we have newly renovated one, two and three bedroom rentals with upgraded finishes. Located in the heart of Reston in a quiet neighborhood, you'll be within walking distance of schools, dining and entertainment. We also feature excellent access to the Beltway, Dulles Toll Road and Dulles International Airport. Even with Trader Joe's right across the street, Reston Town Center is just two minutes away with its luxury shopping, delicious dining and major employers. Plus, enjoy living just minutes to the newly opened Wiehle/Reston Metro station for easy access to Tysons Corner, Arlington, Washington DC and more! We are surrounded by mature trees and are right next to a scenic lake. We have a swimming pool, car wash center and barbecue areas for you, plus a shallow wading pool ...

Description: Homestead at Reston Apartments is located in the heart of vibrant Northern Virginia, placing you in the middle of the Dulles Tech Corridor with easy access to the Dulles Toll Road and Highway 286. Whether you choose our one, two, or three bedroom apartment homes, Homestead at Reston is filled with thoughtful features for living well. Apartment amenities included expansive kitchens, plush carpeting or modern wood plank flooring, and reserved parking options. Our community amenities are impressive as our individual apartments: BBQ areas for spontaneous get-together, a playground for children to frolic and a state-of-the art fitness center. Surrounded by exceptional shopping, dining and entertainment, Homestead at Reston Apartments provides everything you need to feel right at home.

Description: Winterthur is the ultimate in contemporary living – a community that every family would love to live in. With eight different floor plans, Winterthur offers dramatic and innovative apartment designs, such as spiral staircases winding up to penthouse lofts. There are concrete floors between each apartment for sound conditioning and all the privacy you want. Winterthur is served by the Fairfax County school system, one of the top in the nation. At Winterthur you experience a truly serene atmosphere accented by expansive skywalks and tree-shaded entrances. Winterthur is conveniently located near schools, the recreational center, the Sheraton Inn, and the International Conference Center. Metro Bus is located directly in front of the property and the new Silver line Metro Rail stop is a mile from the property. A member of the Reston Assocation, Winterthur gives you wooded walking trails, tennis courts, pools, basketball courts, and soccer fields. Dulles International Airport, Reston Town Center, South Lakes Village Center, Hunters Woods Center, Fox Mill Center, Fair Oaks and Tyson’s Corner are all just minutes away from your door.

Description: All the beauty of a wooded setting with all the convenience of the Reston Town Center. Introducing St. Johns Wood, a luxury apartment community located in the prestigious North Point area of Reston. Located in a secluded setting next to a 54-acre park, across from the North Point Village Center, and only three minutes from Reston Town Center, St. Johns Wood is one of Reston's finest rental communities. I-495, the Dulles Toll Road, I-66, Rt. 7 and I-95 are just minutes away. For longer journeys, Dulles International Airport is only a few minutes away, with flights to almost every spot in the world.

Description: Come see why The Springs at Reston is the perfect place to call your home! Conveniently located in a beautiful wooded setting in Reston of Fairfax County. We are only minutes from many fine shops, restaurants and entertainment at Reston Town Center, The Spectrum at Reston Town Center, North Point Village Center, nearby Tysons Corner and the surrounding Washington D.C. area. Along with the convenience of its excellent location minutes to Dulles Toll Road and the Washington Dulles Airport, the thickly wooded landscape of this community provides plenty of privacy and recreation for its residents along the W&OD trail. Not only do we allow pets, but our pet fees are among the lowest around. If you are looking for the perfect blend of recreation, relaxation, convenience and excitement, you have found your home at The Springs at Reston!

Description: Nestled in the serenity of a beautiful park-like setting, Reston's most spacious apartments await you at Fairway. Beautiful vistas off the golf course and surrounding Virginia Countryside, coupled with the convenience and pleasures of living so close to Reston Town Center, Dulles Toll Road, Route 7, Dulles International Airport as well as all of the shopping, dining and entertainment that DC has to offer, makes Fairway a great place to call home. Fairway offers residents unique one, two, or three-bedroom apartment homes in addition to exclusive amenities to simplify your life such as a BBQ area and playground, stunning views of a golf course and neighboring woods, and high-speed internet and cable ready. Fairway is also conveniently located by bus and train stops to help residents get from one place to another. Take a swim in our pool, stroll through the lushly landscaped community, or spend the day in the nearby Reston Town Center.

Description:
Available fully furnished, partly furnished, or totally empty!
I am attempting to rent this apartment ASAP. I am a motivated sub-letter, and I am open to reviewing all offers. The apartment is currently listed below any going rate currently being offered by the apartment complex. I am open to leaving the apartment move-in ready (furnished).
The apartment is very large with a very open feel to it. The den makes a great area for any kind of space i.e guest room, office, dining area, etc. The kitchen has all modern, stainless steel appliances, with marble tables. Plenty of storage space, including a pantry closet. 
The living area is very large, with hardwood floors, and has large windows including a Juliet balcony. The bedroom also has two large windows, a carpeted floor, and a walk-in closet. The bathroom has another linen closet, large shower/bathtub, and a full washer/dryer unit. 
The amenities in the apartment complex are amazing including - indoor pool with hot-tub, outdoor pool and grilling area, virtual golf room, party room with: billiards, shuffleboard, full chef's kitchen, TV area, and more. There is also a full, modern gym with locker rooms and saunas. Parking is available for an extra $100.

Pet Policy: Dogs and Cats Allowed

Description:
Bright and spacious 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment in beautiful north Reston. Located on a quiet street with easy access to all the walking trails, parks, pools, and amenities Reston has to offer! Perfect for couples or professionals.
**Also listed as 1314 Garden Wall Circle Apt 210 - contact via this listing if not working with a realtor**
-Spacious bedrooms, both with access to their own bathroom (great for two young professionals!)
-9 foot ceilings
-Ample kitchen space with breakfast bar
-Open concept living and dining area
-Beautiful gas fireplace in living area
-Large balcony for outdoor entertaining, smaller balcony off master bedroom
-Plantation shutters on all windows and doors
-Convenient, unrestricted parking
-Fairfax Connector stop immediately outside of complex
-Close to Wiehle Ave Metro and Reston Town Center
*Rent includes water, sewer, trash pickup, parking lot/exterior maintenance
Cats okay, dogs okay (with community restrictions) - pet deposit required

Description:
CONDO WITH GORGEOUS NEW FLOORS, WALK-IN CLOSETS and MORE -- IN SOUGHT AFTER PARC RESTON - 2-MIN. WALK FROM RESTON TOWN CENTER SHOPS, STORES AND RESTAURANTS!
Stainless steel appliances
Air conditioning
Fireplace
Fitness center
Pool
Community center, lounge, conference room
Deck/Balcony
Walk-in closets

Cable and internet ready
Near golf course and jog/bike trails
Luxury Parc Reston Condo--offers 1,000 square feet of open living space, windows and large private covered balcony - available Monday, August 21st.
Features a club house with pool, workout facilities, business center, conference room and lounge. New floors and carpet. Also includes granite counters, maple cabinets, stainless steel appliances and stainless steel appliances.
Rent includes water/trash removal/lawn maintenance/snow removal and use of clubhouse and pool--everything except electricity and phone. Also includes access to all the Reston Association amenities (i.e., 15 additional swimming pools, basketball courts, tennis courts, parks) within the greater Reston community (see RA website for more details:
http://www.reston.org/RestonAssociation-Home/tabid/144/Default.aspx).
Spacious 2br/2ba in delightful community is only a 2-minute walk from Reston Town Center for shopping, restaurants, movies, Starbucks, Best Buy, Harris Teeter, and much more. Near the Wiehle Metro Station (Silver Line), Hwy 267 (Dulles Toll Rd.), Fairfax County Pkwy, Reston Pkwy and Rte 7, W&OD trail, and more all within walking distance - you will LOVE this area - close to everything!
Available Monday, August 21st. Monthly rent based on one-year lease (shorter lease available; call for details). Please email or text for more information, additional photos or to schedule an appointment.

Description: You're sure to enjoy an active lifestyle when you call The Sycamores in Reston, VA your home. These garden-style one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments for rent offer newly renovated kitchens and baths, walk-in closets in select homes, separate dining room, in-home washer/dryer, and balcony or patio. The Sycamores also features a modern clubhouse with state-of-the-art fitness center, basketball court, and off-street parking with car care area. You'll also enjoy free membership to the Reston Association, giving you access to area pools and tennis courts. * Located in the heart of Reston, The Sycamores is between the lush Reston Golf Course and the bustling Reston Town Center. Our apartments are just three blocks from the Metro Bus Station and close to Wiehle-Reston East Station (Silver Line) if you choose a car-free commute. The Sycamores offers convenient access to DC, the Dulles Tollway, I-495, and Dulles International Airport. Pets are welcome and there's no weight limit.

Description: Enjoy WATER VIEWS w/out the waterfront price! Moor your canoe at CLUSTER DOCK! Built by famed Reston builder Warren Katz seamlessly blends the comforts of the man-made world w/ the serenity of the natural one. Nestled in the trees w/ views of Lake Thoreau. Walls of windows & skylights flood home w/ natural light. Remodeled master & upper hall baths. Top level w/ front & rear decks! Private Oasis!

Description: Serene Woodland Retreat! Updated & overlooks 72-acres of parkland! 3 level 3 BR 2 full & 2 half baths. Upgraded eat-in kitchen w/ stainless appliances & breakfast bar. Walk-out lower level opens to private deck spectacular views of a sun-dappled woods from all 3 levels. Excellent location near pools tennis lake METRO & Nature Center!

Description: Less than a mile from the Wiehle Metro this stunning 3 bed 2 bath condo is loaded with tasteful finishes. Plush textured carpet open floor plan with formal dining eat-in kitchen & balcony over looking common area. Master with walk-in closet and gorgeous en suite bath. Interior laundry room and extra storage. 2 parking spots 1 assigned. Pool tennis tot-lot No pets. Available 9/20.

Totally updated from top to bottom -new doors windows flooring paint baths and kitchen. Walk to pools tennis and Reston s extensive pathway system. Close to Silver Line Metro. Walk to Lake Anne's Shops & Restaurants. Enjoy Reston's Pools, Tennis, Basketball, Community Center, Lakes, Trails and More!

Description:
11990 Market Street #1415, Reston VA 20190
.
2BR DEN 2BA 
.
Absolute WOW Factor luxury building. This is life at its finest.
.
Available Immediately is this 2 Bedroom DEN 2 Bath 14th floor Condo, offering Luxury living at its best. Live the Reston Town Center lifestyle in this gorgeous loft style modern home in the best residential building in Reston. 
.
This open style light filled Suite offers hardwood floors, with high end carpet in the bedrooms. Gourmet kitchen, granite countertops, upgraded stainless steel appliances, all wood 42” cabinets, 9 foot ceilings, walk in closets, large modern master bath, balcony, kitchen/family room with floor to ceiling windows that have panoramic view, and comes with two garage spaces.
.
Tenant pays plug in electric only. All other utilities are included.
.
This luxury building features, 24 hour concierge, garage with two spots, elevator security, pool with hot tub, exercise room with modern equipment, massage room, package service, common area party room with full “Super Gourmet” kitchen, indoor seating area, and two large exterior balconies. Business conference room, Theater Room with surround sound, hi luxury hotel style guest suites, and so much more. 
.
The Reston Town Center lifestyle is designed so that you park your car and walk to everything. Over 100 shops, Movie Theater with luxury seating, full retail and office complexes, outdoor concerts, street shows and venues, multiple restaurants, park, fountains, ice skating in winter.
.
Located close to major routes. 30 minutes into Washington DC, 10 Minutes to Dulles Airport. Major hub bus route within walking distance, and the new Silver line Metro is about to open. Bike trail which leads to Leesburg in one direction, and to Washington DC in the other direction. Minutes to Potomac River for water sports and views. Several large parks are available for the outdoor enthusiast, and The Town of Reston offers access to its network of community centers, most with indoor pools.
.
Multi year lease available. Minimum one year lease. Pets considered on a case by case basis.
Laundry room, Door attendant, Elevator, Parking, Storage units, Pool, Fitness center, Club house.
.
Easy online application & rent payments with TMKenny Property Services. See our reviews on Yelp & Google! EOH

Pet Policy: Dogs and Cats Allowed
Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal

Conveniently located near the toll road and approx. 20 min to DC. Laundry in unit. Lots of closet space. Loaded with amenities: rooftop pool, sauna, caf, gym, party room, business center 2 garage parking spaces!

Description: AVAILABLE 1 September 2017! Immaculate first floor, unfurnished one-bedroom condo for rent in outstanding Reston location! Living area with gas fireplace, well-equipped, modern kitchen, large bedroom with walk-in closet and fully tiled bath. Excellent carpet throughout. Patio and storage closet plus additional storage. Located just steps from the community center, fitness center and pool, directly across the street from the Reston Towne Center and adjacent to the Dulles Access Road. 5 minutes to Metro. Parking space included. $1,700 per month plus gas and electric. Water and condo fees included. Security deposit required. Call Tom at 703-517-1811.

Description:
Prime Location: Beautiful, naturally well-lit 2 bedroom 2.5 bathroom townhome in Reston. Walking distance to the shops, dining, and entertainment in Reston Town Center and close to the Washington Dulles Airport and Washington Metro. W&OD Trail nearby for walking/biking/parks. Balcony for relaxing, hardwood flooring on main level and designer finishes throughout. Fully Furnished and outfitted to just bring your suitcase (details and reviews below). 2990/month, 1 month security deposit. Water included. Call Shazia at 571-252-9756.
Welcome to luxury and relaxation in the heart of it all (REVIEWS below)! Immaculate townhome with designer finishes and everything included.
PERFECT location! Just minutes from Reston Town Center, major highways, public transport and great dining, shopping and entertainment. The famous W&OD; trail is just steps behind the home. 
8 minutes to Washington Dulles Airport, 8 minutes to Silver Line Metro, and 25 minutes to Washington, DC. 
Just bring your suitcase! This home has all you need to relax, work, and play. 
Sun-filled home is peaceful, open and treated with love & care. Relax in the coastal inspired master retreat with en-suite bathroom. Lounge in front of the big-screen TV with surround sound that boasts Chromecast, and a Blu-Ray player (FIOS Cable capable). Work in the office while overlooking trees. 
REVIEWS
"This is one of the finest places I have stayed at. It's spacious, uniquely styled and decorated, clean and in a quiet neighbourhood. It's located a short cab drive away from Dulles airport and from here you walk to downtown Reston. The communication with Shazia was great. She assisted me with what I needed and replied quick all the time. Highly recommended. - Johan M.
"Shazia was incredibly kind and welcoming and her home was so inviting and cozy. I couldn't have been happier and would highly recommend!" - Sarah J.
"Shazia was amazing start to finish. She was communicative from the get-go, offering all kinds of helpful information and responding to questions almost immediately. Her home was incredibly easy to find, and as a bonus has its own garage. The inside of her home was... incredible. What a gorgeous residence! I got perhaps the best night's sleep I've had in years in that bed!! The location was super close to Washington-Dulles Airport and it's in a beautiful new neighborhood. If you have the chance to live here - do it!!" - Bailey M.
FULL DETAILS:
LUXURY LIVING
*  Fully furnished with designer furniture
*  Washer/Dryer in Unit
*  Balcony w/ patio furniture
*  Full Kitchen stocked w/ all housewares (plates, cups, silverware, pots/pans, etc) and GE Appliances
*  Essentials (Towels, bed sheets, soap, shampoo, toilet paper)
*  Air Conditioning
*  Heating
*  Fireplace
*  Hair Dryer
*  Iron/Ironing Board 
*  Laptop Friendly workspace
*  Coffee Machine and Keurig 
CLUBHOUSE
*  Free access to the clubhouse including the following (2 min walk): 
o Gym with latest weight and cardio machines 
o Pool (during summer season)
o Sauna 
o Party Room that can host 85 people
COMPLIMENTARY PERKS INCLUDED 
*  Garage with private driveway 
*  Free Guest Parking
*  Nest thermostat
*  Keurig machine 
*  55" Smart TV with surround sound ready 
- Chromecast
- Blu-Ray Player
LOCATION
Highly desired, upscale neighborhood that is extremely quiet and right outside the Reston Town Center. Surrounded by manicured landscaping and mature trees. There is a lake and with so much in walking distance, you may never need to leave the area. www.westmarket.net
WALKABLE TO NATURE, DINING, SHOPPING, TRANSPORT
*  Reston Town Center that includes restaurants, shopping, movies, and ice skating! www.restontowncenter.com
*  Reston Hospital Center 
*  Hyatt Conference Center & Hotel
*  Movie Theater
*  Library
*  Shopping (Target, Whole Foods, Apple, JCrew, Banana Republic, Pottery Barn, Trader Joe's, Sephora, CVS, and much more) 
*  Exercise/Nature - W&OD; Outdoor Trail (Biking/Running/Walking)
*  Gyms - YMCA, Crunch Fitness
*  Dining (Morton's, M&S Grill, Clyde's, Ted's Bulletin, Silver Diner, Chick Fila, Potbelly, Chipotle, and much more)
ACCESSIBILITY
Highly accessible to major highways including the Toll Road (267), Route 7, and Fairfax County Parkway (286). Public transportation includes Silver Line Metro which is 5 minutes by car or accessible by a Bus stop within walking distance. Washington Dulles airport is ~5 miles away. 
Minutes away from major corporations including: Microsoft, Google, Oracle, Bechtel, Booz Allen Hamilton, Amazon, Leidos, Rolls Royce, Sprint, comScore, Carahsoft, Unisys, College Board, Verisign, Learning Tree, Fannie Mae, Appian, Maximus, Gate Gourmet, Serco, Clarabridge, Dell, and Reston Hospital Center.
This is managed by a professional landlord so you have excellent communication, hospitality and service during your stay - no more apartment conglomerates!
